classes.description: A nation with its own government and territory
A defined region or state of a country

properties.description: The country the province lies in
properties.name: inCountry

classes.description: The type of grapes a wine is made of

properties.description: The name of the variety, which is the name of the grape
properties.name: name

classes.description: A wine that has been tasted and reviewed

properties.description: A few sentences from a sommelier describing the wine's taste, smell, look, feel, etc.
properties.name: description

properties.description: The country that the wine is from
properties.name: fromCountry

properties.description: The vineyard within the winery where the grapes that made the wine are from
properties.name: designation

properties.description: The number of points WineEnthusiast rated the wine on a scale of 1-100 (reviews are only of wines with a score of 80-100)
properties.name: points

properties.description: The cost for a bottle of wine
properties.name: price

properties.description: The province or state that the wine is from
properties.name: fromProvince

properties.description: The type of grapes used to make the wine
properties.name: hasVariety
